EmailTemplate.name: 2020_Greenhouse_IMUs_Ongoing-Lead-Dark_Nurture.Email 1: Thank you for your inter
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for your interest
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for interest in our Honeywell HGuide inertial measurement unit and inertial navigation products. Someone will be in touch with you shortly. In the meantime, we wanted to share a couple helpful resources with you:
- Honeywell HGuide YouTube Playlist: Watch all our videos here <[[https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLH21RF-YmEQRLNipN5eX3LQXNfgBHxNCB]]>. - Product Manuals: Need access to one of our manuals? Just ask us and weâ€™ll share them with you <[[mailto:hguide.sales@honeywell.com]]>. - Engineering Support: Need help with integration? Our engineers are here to help <[[mailto:hguide.support@honeywell.com]]>. - Looking for other HGuide products? You can find them here <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/products/sensors/honeywell-hguide-inertial-sensors-and-navigators]]>.
Did we miss something? Let us know.
We look forward to speaking with you.
The HGuide Support Team
